code: import React,{useEffect,useState,Component}from"react";import{StyledName,StyledPosition,StyledDescription}from"./styles";import{Container,ImageGroup}from"semantic-ui-react";import linkedin from"../../res/images/linkedin.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class FounderCard extends React.Component{render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"ui grid ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"row",style:{alignItems:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"four wide column",style:{position:"left",justifyItems:"left",marginRight:"20px",transform:"translateX(-20px)"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{width:"235px"},src:this.props.img})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"eight wide column",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{style:{textAlign:"left",width:"574px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledName,{children:this.props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(StyledPosition,{children:[this.props.position,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:this.props.linkedin,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{width:"24px",transform:"translate(14px, 4px)"},alt:"",src:linkedin,onMouseOut:e=>e.currentTarget.src=linkedin})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledDescription,{children:this.props.description})]})})]})});}}export default FounderCard;
